author: wn.com
title: Stephen Hawking Says We Should Really Be Scared Of Capitalism, Not Robots
text: Machines won't bring about the economic robot apocalypse -- but greedy humans will, according to physicist Stephen Hawking . In a Reddit Ask Me Anything session on Thursday, the scientist predicted that economic inequality will skyrocket as
